DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : To evaluate effect size non-specific chronic low back pain ( CLBP ) evidence-based physiotherapy ( EBP ) without addition deep water run ( DWR ) pain , physical disability general health state . Materials method : Randomized , double-blind , control trial ( therapists assessor ) involve 46 person CLBP 15 week two intervention , present three time week . Each group receive EBP ( personalized exercise program , manual therapy health education ) one group perform supplementary 20 min session DWR individualize aerobic threshold . Measurements make pre post intervention pain , disability general health . Range motion lumbar spine sagittal plane , maximum isometric strength muscle endurance lumbar hip extensor assessment .
